text: Ezɨ Israelia, Solomon me gamizɨ me an ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar itir pu. Bar puvatɨ, a me isa mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, gavmanɨn ingangarim gamir gumazir dapaniba, ko mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapanibar me arɨki. Egha marazi isa, karisɨn tuiva ghua mɨsozir ingangarim ko, gumazir hoziabagh apiagha ghua mɨsozibar ingangarim me ganɨngi.
